snippet.title: 101 Gameplay Trailer | Eternal Strands
snippet.description:
Join Mike Laidlaw and learn everything you need to know about the gameplay mechanics, world, and characters in the upcoming fantasy action-adventure title, Eternal Strands. 

Nearly everything you see is climbable, breakable, and can be frozen or set on fire. Combine kinetic, frost, or flame magic with an arsenal of weapons to take down massive 25-meter foes. Discover the secrets of the Enclave alongside a vibrant and warm cast of characters.

Eternal Strands - Coming 2025. Wishlist now 👉 https://linkin.bio/ybg/

Follow us on our official social media channels:     
- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/YellowBrickGames_QC
- X (formerly Twitter): https://www.twitter.com/YellowBrick_QC
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/yellowbrickgames
- Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/yellowbrickgames
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yellowbrickgames
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/yellow-brick-games-inc
